title: (x) hand written "New Shower Gels" / strict geometric "Countdown" - hand written / custom face {Yves, Tina}
content:
I want to find out what these two fonts are...

Any suggestions?

Thanks!!!

author: bsricc

comments.content: Don’t know about the second one, but your first sample — “New Shower Gels” that looks like hand writing — is exactly that: hand written. Look at the three _Es_ and two _Ws_, they’re clearly different from each other.
the second one — NBC — is custom.
